programme.title: Live: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: Live: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: NBA Countdown
programme.desc: "NBA Countdown" serves as the primer for game telecasts on the ESPN family of networks. It's highlighted by a lively roundtable discussion and debate of the top storylines around the league. Seats at the table are reserved for folks in ESPN's stable of NBA hosts and analysts, with the latter group imparting wisdom based on their many years of playing experience.

programme.desc: The Celtics host the Pacers for Game 1 of the Eastern Conference finals. Indiana advanced to its first East finals in 10 years with a seven-game series win over New York. Indiana defeated Boston 122-112 in the NBA In-Season Tournament quarterfinals.

The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter

The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: The Point
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship hockey show featuring highlights, news, analysis, speed, skill and access to the biggest stars, stories and personalities of the game. Hosted by John Buccigross.

programme.title: Cornhole
programme.desc: Action from the lawn game in which players try to toss a bean bag into a hole at the end of a raised platform.

programme.title: Cornhole
programme.desc: From The Expo at World Market Center in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFC's lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era, featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Events
programme.desc: Dustin Poirier vs. Justin Gaethje; from UFC on FOX 30 on April 14, 2018.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: The Canucks and Oilers play a decisive Game 7 in their Western Conference semifinal. Edmonton forced the winner-moves-on contest with a 5-1 victory over Vancouver in Game 6. Evan Bouchard and Ryan Nugent-Hopkins (EDM) each had a goal and two assists.

programme.title: Live: Unsportsmanlike with Evan, Canty and Michelle

programme.title: Get Up

Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After the death of his father, T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king. When a powerful enemy suddenly reappears, T'Challa's mettle as king -- and as Black Panther -- gets tested when he's drawn into a conflict that puts the fate of Wakanda and the entire world at risk. Faced with treachery and danger, the young king must rally his allies and release the full power of Black Panther to defeat his foes and secure the safety of his people.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Now that Chris and his girlfriend, Rose, have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, she invites him for a weekend getaway with Missy and Dean. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries leads him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean hits the road with Jack, who needs to complete a final ritual in the quest to beat Chuck; a difference of opinion leaves Sam and Castiel behind as they look for answers to questions of their own.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: With the plan in full motion, Sam, Dean, Castiel and Jack fight for the good of the common goal.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Everything is on the line as the battle against God continues; a familiar face returns to join the fight.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly reopens a 1988 case involving four high-school friends who are brought in for questioning when another is found dead.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly and the team reopen the case of a 1994 teen suicide when a small piece of a note appears.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a frazzled mother bursts into the Philadelphia Police Department claiming to know who might have killed her daughter at a 1968 debutante ball, Lilly reopens the case.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: A Wrong Day's Journey Into Right
programme.desc: With Piper away at magic school and Phoebe without her active powers, overworked Paige conjures Mr. Right (Gabriel Olds) for stress relief but, unknowingly, releases his evil twin, Mr. Wrong.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Gideon (Gildart Jackson) conspires with two demons to make Piper, Phoebe and Paige part of "Witch Wars," a new demonic reality television show where demon contestants compete in a series of contests to hunt down the Charmed ones.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Gideon unintentionally creates a portal that sends Chris and Leo to an alternate world where evil rules.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe and Paige attempt to rescue Chris and Leo but find themselves battling their evil counterparts.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: It's the final ride for saving people and hunting things.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When their father goes missing, Dean and Sam follow the clues from his phone message until they get to a small town where they encounter a violent spirit called the Woman in White.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When they follow their father's coordinates to the middle of the woods, Sam and Dean come face-to-face with a mythical Wendigo.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean take on the angry spirit of a little boy causing a series of mysterious drownings that officials had written off as suicides.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: While King Leonidas and his 300 Spartans have their date with destiny at Thermopylae, another battle against the Persians is brewing, this time at sea. Themistocles (Sullivan Stapleton), a Greek general, sees the threat posed by the God-King Xerxes of Persia. He knows that he must unite all of Greece if he is to stand any chance of repelling the Persian invasion. Even if he accomplishes his mission, Themistocles must still face Artemisia (Eva Green), the ruthless leader of the Persian armada.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: Iron Man, Thor, the Hulk and the rest of the Avengers unite to battle their most powerful enemy yet -- the evil Thanos. On a mission to collect all six Infinity Stones, Thanos plans to use the artifacts to inflict his twisted will on reality. The fate of the planet and existence itself has never been more uncertain as everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After the death of his father, T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king. When a powerful enemy suddenly reappears, T'Challa's mettle as king -- and as Black Panther -- gets tested when he's drawn into a conflict that puts the fate of Wakanda and the entire world at risk. Faced with treachery and danger, the young king must rally his allies and release the full power of Black Panther to defeat his foes and secure the safety of his people.

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: Political pressure mounts to install a system of accountability when the actions of the Avengers lead to collateral damage. The new status quo deeply divides members of the team. Captain America (Chris Evans) believes superheroes should remain free to defend humanity without government interference. Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.) sharply disagrees and supports oversight. As the debate escalates into an all-out feud, Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner) must pick a side.

programme.title: The Batman
programme.desc: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues. As the evidence begins to lead closer to home and the scale of the perpetrator's plans become clear, he must forge new relationships, unmask the culprit and bring justice to the abuse of power and corruption that has long plagued the metropolis.

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda must deal with her prime suspect's unbreakable alibi; Brenda and Fritz argue about their future together.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe and Piper steal the golden chalice in order to bring the fountain of youth to life and save Paige from a curse that an 18th-century pirate gave to her.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After Leo and Piper inadvertently receive the powers of Hindu gods, Phoebe and Paige must keep them from consummating their love in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a bored student at the Magic School accidentally conjures up Lady Godiva and Lord Dyson, the Charmed Ones must keep Dyson from killing Lady Godiva before she can go back in time and complete her famous ride.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Grams puts a spell on the brothers to end their rivalry, but the spell turns the Charmed Ones into bickering teens; Leo consults a demonic seer (Charisma Carpenter) to find out who is behind the attack on Wyatt.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: On TransNational flight 2485, a man possessed by the spirit of a phantom traveler causes the plane to crash, leaving only five survivors.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Before she can kill again, Sam and Dean must destroy the violent spirit of Bloody Mary, unwittingly summoned by mischievous teens.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: A shape-shifter adopts the likenesses of others and murders people.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When a mythical, vengeful creature terrorizes a small college town in Iowa, Sam and Dean race to find and destroy the Hook Man's bones before he comes for them.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Deadly swarms of bees, locusts, spiders and beetles overcome a town when a new housing development is built atop sacred Indian land.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: A vision of a woman trapped in his childhood house haunts Sam, and he convinces reluctant Dean that they need to go home.
